SEARCH
Package service

Class Note

java.lang.Object
service.Note
public class Note extends Object
The Note class represents a note in the game. It defines properties and behavior related to notes.

    • Note

      public Note(int spawnDistance, Image noteImage, int targetXPos, int targetYPos, int size)
      Constructs a Note object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      spawnDistance - the distance from where the note spawns
      noteImage - the image representing the note
      targetXPos - the x-coordinate of the target position
      targetYPos - the y-coordinate of the target position
      size - the size of the note
